resources.string: Welcome To TamaSaver an app to encourage you to save energy. In A Friendly Helpful Manner, In order to do this we will need to ask some questions about your environment. \n\nPlease Swipe To the right to Continue
Do you Live in Rented Accomidation
Do You work In an Institution?
Do want hints to help you improve if you dont win at the game?

TamaSaver will hopefully encourage you to save energy and learn about saving energy thought A simple game and a basic playfull interaction. The game can be started form the home screen by choosing the dice and doing well at the game will result in the TamaSaver Character becoming happier altought losing will result in the character being sadder. Try The Game Now Click Below

The home screen of the application consists of a series of buttons describing areas where energy may be saved in your life. You are encouraged to push a button when feel you have saved energy in one of them, doing this regullarly will keep your character happy and well feed, failing to save energy will result in the character feeling neglected. The buttons are shown below.

About: \nMany Thanks For using this application, this application makes use of a datasource from :\"Glasgow Caledonian University (2010). Carbon Cutter Tool for Going Carbon Neutral Stirling. Used with kind permission of Going Carbon Neutral Scotland. \"
